synopsis.text: Based on the information provided, this anime takes place in a special school with students who have animal-like strengths and characteristics. Their powers enable them to protect the world from monsters who aim to destroy it. Details about the specific animal abilities possessed by the students are not explicitly stated. The anime is associated with the Nexon Animation Project and is intended to be an adaptation of a fantasy action PC game, though specifics on the gameâ€™s plot are not clearly outlined. There is mention of this anime being the third entry in this particular franchise. Though some additional context is lacking, the core premise seems to center around gifted students battling threats to the world, likely in an adventurous fantasy setting.
